data.title: Knox Regional Netball Centre
data.meta_description: The Knox Regional Netball Centre (KRNC) is the leading netball centre in Knox.
data.text:
Location and opening hours

Visit us at 9 Dempster Street, Ferntree Gully.

We're open:

Monday to Friday: 9:00 am - 9:00 pm

Saturday: 9:00 am - 5:00 pm (open for Mountain District Netball Association competition)

Sunday: 3:30 pm - 9:00 pm

Closing times may change due to bookings, competitions and school holidays. We're closed on public holidays.

About the Netball Centre

The Knox Regional Netball Centre has:

4 indoor netball courts with sprung timber floorboards

18 outdoor netball courts

air-conditioned meeting rooms for hire

Council competitions

We run 2 indoor competitions with badged umpires:

Friday morning ladies' competition

Sunday evening mixed netball competition

There are 2 seasons per year:

autumn: February to June

spring: July to December

Fees:

team registration: $80.00

weekly team fee: $80.00 (pay before the game)

For more information:

call 9758 7191

email [email protected]

Mountain District Netball Association

The Mountain District Netball Association (MDNA) runs:

Monday night netball

walking netball

Saturday competition

NetSetGo

boys netball

tournaments

representative netball

Contact MDNA for more information.

Venue hire

Meeting rooms

seat 10 to 30 people

cost $42.00 per hour for casual hire

Indoor courts

The main indoor stadium has 4 netball courts with permanent and temporary tiered seating.

off-peak (6 am to 5 pm Monday - Friday): $40.00 per court/hour

peak (5 pm to 6 am Monday - Friday, all day Saturday and Sunday): $56.00 per court/game

Outdoor courts

casual hire: $25.00 per court/hour

daytime tournaments: $594.00 per day

nighttime with lights: $38.00 per court/hour (maximum 4 courts)

For functions or hire outside staffed hours, call us on 9758 7191 for more information and pricing.

Need help?

Email [email protected] and we will get back to you.

Or call us on 9758 7191.
